1106408745058349058.text: Fully synced @bitcoincoreorg node, completed in approximately 4hrs & 45mins, 225GB total.

1111238342916620288.text:
Syncing an @ethereum full archive mainnet node, via Geth v1.9.0-unstable. Machine: i9-7980XE, 128GB DDR4 SDRAM, Intel DC P4600 4TB PCIe NVMe SSD.
